Project Inspection Date: 22-Jan-2020 Inspection Type: Routine Number of Critical Issues Found: 2 Number of Non-Critical Issues Found: 3 Hazard Level: Moderate <<<<<<< Final_project/app/src/main/res/values/strings.xml Building not in accordance with the Regulation. Operation of an unapproved food premises. Failure to hold a valid permit. Permit not posted in a conspicuous location. Food contaminated or unfit for human consumption. Food not processed in a safe way. Food not cooled in an acceptable manner. Food not cooked or reheated in a safe way. Cold potentially hazardous food stored above 4 °C. Hot potentially hazardous food stored below 60 °C. Foods obtained from unapproved sources. Food not protected from contamination. Food not thawed in an acceptable manner. Frozen potentially food stored above -18 °C. Operator has not provided acceptable food handling. The surfaces not maintained in sanitary condition. The surfaces not properly washed and sanitized. The sanitary maintenance not adequate. Premises not free of pests. May allow entrance/harbouring/breeding of pests. Food premises not maintained in a sanitary condition. The surfaces are not of suitable design/material. The surfaces are not in good working order. Chemicals cleansers stored or labeled improperly. Single use containers are used more than once. Premises not maintained as per approved plans. Unwanted items are stored at food premises. Live animal on the premises. Operator has not provided acceptable procedures. Equipments lack accurate thermometers. No enough handwashing stations for employees. Employee does not wash hands properly or at adequate frequency. Employee lacks good personal hygiene clean clothing and hair control. Employee smoking in food preparation/processing/storage areas. Operator does not have FOODSAFE Level 1 or Equivalent. In operator’s absence no staff on duty has FOODSAFE Level 1 or equivalent. ======= Name restaurantName 12808 King George Blvd, Surrey latitude longitude Restaurant
>>>>>>> Final_project/app/src/main/res/values/strings.xml
